participant_1.background: i have brown curly hair. i'll graduate from high school in two years. i like riding horses. my bedroom is purple and lime green.

participant_2.background: my father is in the army. i recently was fired and had to get a new job. i work in the insurance business. my mom passed away when i was young.

content.text: Ohh what's your age when your mom passed away?
I am sorry to hear that. do you like horses? I have two
